Free,open,simple

Blogr is a free and open source application backed by a community of helpful developers. It supports features such as code syntax highlighting, RRS feeds, social media integration,third-party commenting tools, and works seamlessly with Google Analytics. The architecture is clean and is relatively easy to learn
